description:
This course is not sponsored by or affiliated with Udemy, Inc.


  • Over 8000 satisfied students enrolled in my courses
  • Over 95 5 Star Reviews from very happy students
  • Course updated on the 16th of Septembre 2015.

Everything has changed in 2015..Udemy has updated its algorithm and the competition is higher than it has ever been... So many instructors are promoting their courses outside of Udemy and they are making a lot of money in 2015...:-)

In this course, I will show you 37 promotion techniques that most successful instructors on Udemy are using so that you can start making more money on Udemy with your courses... Everything is explained below:

  • Do you feel frustrated that your course doesn't make money (not as much as you want)?
  • Do you want to learn 26 effective ways to promote your Udemy course and make more money in 2015?
  • Do you want to learn how other instructors are promoting their courses (but they will rarely tell you how)?
Did you know:
  • that you can upload your Udemy course to 4 different platforms and make money without having to promote your course there (without almost changing anything)?
  • that you can post coupons for your courses in at least 10 different places on the internet (which are created for that)?
  • that you can promote your course on at least 3 forums ( and get massive traffic to your course)?
  • that there are also 9 other ways to generate more money with your course on Udemy?

If you want to learn the 26 ways to promote your Udemy course to make more money in one hour only in 2015(guaranteed if you follow my advices), you can enroll on the right :)

*You have nothing to lose and everything to gain. Try this course and if you can honestly say that you learnt nothing, just email Udemy and they will give you a 100% refund within 30 days.*
title: Udemy Marketing Secrets for Instructors - Unofficial
